pullrequest.title: Modify gazebo rendering to compile with Ogre 1.11/1.12

content.raw:
This PR contains almost all the changes necessary to compile Gazebo 10 with Ogre 1.11/1.12 .

I still need to polish the PR \(for stuff like code style\) but I already open this PR to permit any interested user to provide early feedback.

To actually compile the code with Ogre 1.11/1.12, an additional modification to the Heightmap class is necessary, but as that one is not obvious and probably will require a bit more discussion, I prefer to keep it in a separate PR \( [#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3130](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3130)  \).
content.html:
This PR contains almost all the changes necessary to compile Gazebo 10 with Ogre 1.11/1.12 .

I still need to polish the PR (for stuff like code style) but I already open this PR to permit any interested user to provide early feedback.

To actually compile the code with Ogre 1.11/1.12, an additional modification to the Heightmap class is necessary, but as that one is not obvious and probably will require a bit more discussion, I prefer to keep it in a separate PR ( #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3130 ).
